Class Controller

java.lang.Object
app.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Class to control cashier_menu.fxml

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws Exception
      Retreives the menu items from the database and populates the items arrayList. Populates then menu and sdit screens when they are first open with each item.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • openAddItemWindow

      public void openAddItemWindow(MenuItem menuItem)
      Opens the screen to customize and add an item and sets the screen to display the right menu item.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - the menu item that is being added.

    • addItemScreenInit

      public void addItemScreenInit()
      Initializes the quantity spinner for the add item screen.

    • setDrinkInfo

      public void setDrinkInfo(String drinkName, double price, int id)
      Sets the title for the add ite screen.
      Parameters:
      drinkName - name of the menu item.
      price - price of the menu item.
      id - id of the menu item from the database.

    • handleAddToOrder

      public void handleAddToOrder()
      When the cashier adds the item to the cart it adds the item, customization, and quantity to an arrayList keeping track of the cart.

    • onCartButtonClicked

      public void onCartButtonClicked() throws Exception
      Loads then checkout screen when the cart button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • onInventoryButtonClicked

      public void onInventoryButtonClicked() throws Exception
      Loads the inventory screen when the inventory button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • onEmployeeButtonClicked

      public void onEmployeeButtonClicked() throws Exception
      Loads the employee screen when the employee button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • onTrendsButtonClicked

      public void onTrendsButtonClicked() throws Exception
      Loads the trends screen when the trends button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • onEditMenuClicked

      public void onEditMenuClicked() throws Exception
      Loads the screen to edit items when the edit menu button is clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • editlogic

      public void editlogic(MenuItem item)
      When the edit button is selected for an item, it creates a popup and prompts the user for each name, price, and calories and validates input. It also updates the changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - the menu item that the user is trying to edit.

    • updateMenuItem

      public static void updateMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      This is the logic to push the edited items to the database.
      Parameters:
      item - the menu item that was changed.

    • handleAddNewItem

      public void handleAddNewItem() throws Exception
      When the User trys to add a new item, this prompts the user for item name, price, calories, and a recipe and validates the input. This also adds the new item to the database and updates the menu ui.
      Throws:
      Exception - issues loading window components

    • insertMenuItem

      public void insertMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      This is the logic for adding the new menu item to the database.
      Parameters:
      item - this si the menu item that is being added.
